name: Zoe Beta
summary: Zoe for Oculus Quest is a learning platform letting you design, visually program, and play your own interactive experiences all within your headset. Setting up your environment is easy: you can select from a variety of backgrounds, then drag and drop the models you want from the included 3D library. You can resize, rotate and place each model in your scene, and decide whether they are static or can be grabbed, are influenced by gravity...
